attributes.action: Extend the theory pass certificates for another year or two
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because it is unfair that we haven’t been able to get the full use out of our theory test pass certificates because of the backlog of driving tests and the numerous lockdowns, some people may have passed their theory a year ago and because of the lockdowns they haven’t been able to take any driving tests what so ever. If COVID-19 and the lockdowns wasn’t a thing this wouldn’t be an issue, people who passed their theory would have been able to have driving tests.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to extend our theory pass certificates for about her year or two because of COVID-19 and the numerous lockdowns some people haven’t been able to have a driving test and a year might have gone since they passed their theory exam.
